infobox.Japanese title:: 不思議な春のかぶと虫  (Fushigi na Haru no Kabutomushi)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Miwako Sato  Wataru Takagi  Misao Yamamura  Detective Terashima
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Toshio Furukawa as Misao Yamamura  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Kōichi Tōchika as Detective Terashima  Masaya Taki as Saburo Haruna  Takehito Koyasu as Yutaka Araki  Yūsuke Numata as Toshiya Ninomiya  Katsuhisa Hōki as Minoru Shirai  Hikaru Midorikawa as Takashi Ishida
infobox.Closing song:: Nemuru Kimi no Yokogao ni Hohoemi o

sections.Situation:
The Detective Boys, with Genta's persuasion, decide to visit a pet shop where they find the owner, Minoru Shirai, dead.

They find a Rhinoceros beetle and pamphlets of an insect museum at Gunma Prefecture. Takagi drives the Detective Boys to the museum where they learn that a truck load of Rhinoceros beetles were stolen from the van. Conan investigates and realizes Shirai and an accomplice were the thieves and that the accomplice was the murderer.

- Takagi drives in a 1966 Light Blue Toyota Publica De Luxe [UP20-D].
